meanings.definition: Relating to or located at the positive electrode of an electrical device.
meanings.sent1: The anodal end of the battery is where the electricity flows out.
meanings.sent2: The anodal wire should be connected to the positive terminal for the device to work.
meanings.sent3: The anodal side of the magnet seemed to attract all the paperclips in the room!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the anodal light in a dark room, bright and full of energy.
meanings.sent5: The anodal charge in the air made everything feel alive and buzzing with power.
